name: SnowReportforPerfectNorthSlopes
0:
”Alexa, open Perfect North Slopes”
”Alexa, ask Perfect North Slopes for the snow report”

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: perfect north slopes
des: The Perfect North Slopes Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions, base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
